name: Birbs Of Prey
description:
An edutainment game about natural selection!

Controls:

Attack / Interact / Select : A 

START: Enter on keyboard, Start on controller

Dash: Q on keyboard, Shoulder buttons on controller

Tips

Use the prophecy to anticipate what each stage will be like and pick adaptations that suit the environment! For example, improved metabolism helps during a long winter, and webbed feet can help cross all the rivers during a flood.
